access_mask.description: The sum of hexadecimal values of requested access rights.

activity_id.description: The activity ID of the event.

actor_process.description: The process that performed the activity on the file object

file.description: The file that is the target of the activity.

src_endpoint.description: The Endpoint from which the file access was requested.

caption: File Access Check
description: File Access Check events report when a network share object was checked to see whether client can be granted desired access on a file.
name: file_access_check
